properties.name: Halstead-Reitan Battery
properties.definition_text:
The Halstead-Reitan Neuropsychological Battery is a combination of neuropsychological tests used to assess the possible physical aspects and localization of neurological damage. 

Trails A and B
Verbal Fluency
Halstead Category Test
Spatial Positional Reasoning
Tactual Performance Test
Rhythm Test
Speech Sounds Perception Test
Finger Oscillation Test

and several ancillary tests.  See: http://www.minddisorders.com/Flu-Inv/Halstead-Reitan-Battery.html for details.
